EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to subscriber notifying auto-renewal.
EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Open 1 @ –60 Days: Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Compliance Week membership is expiring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your subscription renewal
My Account | Contact Us | Terms & Conditions Log-In Required
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Subscription_Contact__c},
Thank you for being a member of Compliance Week, we sincerely appreciate your business. Your membership will automatically renew on {!Opportunity.Subscription_Starts__c} at {!Opportunity.Amount} for one year.
Please log in to submit payment and update your account. If you do not wish to renew, please call me at (617) 570-8608 or reply to this email, prior to {!Opportunity.Subscription_Starts__c}.
Best regards,
Angela Ruggiero Business Development Associate (617) 570-8608 angela.ruggiero@complianceweek.com
Subscription Details Payment Methods
Type: {!Opportunity.Single_Multi__c}-User Term: {!Opportunity.Subscription_Starts__c}–{!Opportunity.Subscription_Expires__c} Amount: {!Opportunity.Amount} Invoice: {!Opportunity.Invoice__c} Online Log-In Mail Order Accounts Payable Compliance Week 129 Portland St Fl 6 Boston MA 02114-2014 Call (617) 570-8608
